redo_or_repeat.doc_string: Redos the last undo or repeats the last action if there is no undo to revert.

refresh_folder_list.doc_string: Refreshs the folder list in the sidebar from the filesystem.

remove_folder.doc_string: Removes the given directorie(s) from the sidebar.

args.name: dirs
args.doc_string: The list of directorie(s) to be removed.

remove_license.doc_string: Removes the license. This will cause Sublime Text to go into an unregistered state.

reopen.doc_string: Reopens the file with a given encoding.

args.name: encoding
args.doc_string: The encoding to be used when the file is reopened.

reopen_last_file.doc_string: Reopens the most recently closed file.

replace_all.doc_string: Replaces all tokens in the view, which matches the pattern in the Find input field.

replace_completion_with_auto_complete.doc_string: Replaces the most recently inserted completion with the next result provided by the auto completion engine.

replace_next.doc_string: Replaces the next token in the view, which matches the pattern in the Find input field.

resize_window.doc_string: Resizes the window's external bounds to the specified width and height.

args.name: width
args.doc_string: The external width of the window.

args.name: height
args.doc_string: The external height of the window.

reveal_link_source.doc_string: Resolves a symlink to expand the folder it represents.

args.name: dirs
args.doc_string: The list of symlink directorie(s) to be resolved.

reveal_in_side_bar.doc_string: Reveals the active view's file in the sidebar.

right_delete.doc_string: Deletes the character to the right of the text selection caret(s).

run_macro_file.doc_string: Runs a macro saved in a macro file.

args.name: file
args.doc_string: The 'Packages/' relative path to the '.sublime-macro' file.

rename_path.doc_string: Renames the given file(s) on disk.

args.name: paths
args.doc_string: A list of absolute file paths to be renamed.

rename_file.doc_string: Renames the file on disk. Uses a TextInputHandler if the 'new_name' argument is not provided.

args.name: new_name
args.doc_string: The new name for the file.

run_syntax_tests.doc_string: Runs all the syntax test(s) associated with a given '.sublime-syntax' or '.tmLanguage' file or a single syntax test file if the active view's file name starts with 'syntax_test'

args.name: find_all
args.doc_string: Whether to run the syntax test for all files that begin with 'syntax_test'. The default value is 'False', indicating that the syntax test is run only for the active 'syntax_test' file.

rot13.doc_string: Uses the Rot13 algorithm to encode the given selection at caret location(s).

reset_font_size.doc_string: Resets the font size to the default value.
